pr_title: changed jwtBuilder attribute elapsedNbf to nbfOffset

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested update

Identifies the time when JWT is accepted for processing. The value must be a NumericDate object.
timeline.author: Charlotte-Holt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -101,9 +101,9 @@ jwkEndpointUrl.desc=Specifies a JWK end point URL.
 useSystemPropertiesForHttpClientConnections=Use system properties for HTTP client connections
 useSystemPropertiesForHttpClientConnections.desc=Specifies whether to use Java system properties when the JWT Consumer creates HTTP client connections. Set this property to true if you want the connections to use the http* and javax* system properties.
 
-elapsedNBF=Elapsed not before claim
-elapsedNBF.desc=Identifies the elapsed time until JWT will start to be accepted for processing. The value must be a NumericDate. 
+nbfOffset=Not before claim offset
+nbfOffset.desc=Identifies the time when JWT will start to be accepted for processing. The value must be a NumericDate.

timeline.bodyText:
Update

Specify a comma separated list of valid amr claim values to be used.

To

Specify a comma-separated list of valid amr claim values to be used.
timeline.author: Charlotte-Holt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -101,9 +101,9 @@ jwkEndpointUrl.desc=Specifies a JWK end point URL.
 useSystemPropertiesForHttpClientConnections=Use system properties for HTTP client connections
 useSystemPropertiesForHttpClientConnections.desc=Specifies whether to use Java system properties when the JWT Consumer creates HTTP client connections. Set this property to true if you want the connections to use the http* and javax* system properties.
 
-elapsedNBF=Elapsed not before claim
-elapsedNBF.desc=Identifies the elapsed time until JWT will start to be accepted for processing. The value must be a NumericDate. 
+nbfOffset=Not before claim offset
+nbfOffset.desc=Identifies the time when JWT will start to be accepted for processing. The value must be a NumericDate. 
 
 #Do not translate "amr"
 amrValues=Authentication methods references in string array
-amrValues.desc= Specifies Authentication Methods References so it can enforce step-up authentication and know how the user is authenticated. Specify a comma separated list of valid amr claim values to be used.
\ No newline at end of file
+amrValues.desc= Specifies Authentication Methods References so it can enforce step-up authentication and know how the user is authenticated. Specify a comma separated list of valid amr claim values to be used.

changed jwtBuilder attribute elapsedNbf to nbfOffset
